### Learning Objectives

* Explain the logic and limitations of different non-experimental designs that can be used when randomization is not possible or ethical

## Before class

### Prepare

* Review [STROBE statement and guidelines](https://www.strobe-statement.org/index.php?id=strobe-home){target="_blank"}
* Read the Introduction and Method sections of the following articles:
  * **Case Report:** Centers for Disease Control CDC. (1981). Pneumocystis pneumoniaâ€“Los Angeles. [*MMWR. Morbidity and mortality weekly report, 30(21)*](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/june_5.htm){target="_blank"}.
  * **Cross-Sectional:** Ahmed, S., Choi, Y., Rimon, J. G., Alzouma, S., Gichangi, P., Guiella, G., ... & Omoluabi, E. (2019). Trends in contraceptive prevalence rates in sub-Saharan Africa since the 2012 London Summit on Family Planning: results from repeated cross-sectional surveys. [*The Lancet Global Health, 7(7)*](https://www.thelancet.com/journals/langlo/article/PIIS2214-109X(19)30200-1/fulltext){target="_blank"}, e904-e911.
  * **Case-Control:** Shrivastava, A., Kumar, A., Thomas, J. D., Laserson, K. F., Bhushan, G., Carter, M. D., ... & Dwivedi, M. (2017). Association of acute toxic encephalopathy with litchi consumption in an outbreak in Muzaffarpur, India, 2014: a case-control study. [*The Lancet Global Health, 5(4)*](https://www.thelancet.com/journals/langlo/article/PIIS2214-109X(17)30035-9/fulltext){target="_blank"}, e458-e466.

  * **Prospective Cohort:** Oliosi, J. G. N., Reis-Santos, B., Locatelli, R. L., Sales, C. M. M., da Silva Filho, W. G., da Silva, K. C., ... & Pereira, S. M. (2019). Effect of the Bolsa Familia Programme on the outcome of tuberculosis treatment: a prospective cohort study. [*The Lancet Global Health, 7(2)*](https://www.thelancet.com/journals/langlo/article/PIIS2214-109X(18)30478-9/fulltext){target="_blank"}, e219-e226.
